heading: HR00286
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN IMMEDIATE INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, BY THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION, ON THE APPARENT FAILURE OF MARINA AND THE PHILIPPINE COAST GUARD TO ENSURE THE SEAWORTHINESS OF M/V LITE FERRY 16 THAT CAUGHT ABLAZE WHICH RESULTED IN THE LOSS OF LIVES AND PROPERTIES AND THE ACTUAL DELAY IN THE RESCUE OF PASSENGERS WHO WERE ADRIFT AT OPEN SEA
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00286
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN IMMEDIATE INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, BY THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION, ON THE APPARENT FAILURE OF MARINA AND THE PHILIPPINE COAST GUARD TO ENSURE THE SEAWORTHINESS OF M/V LITE FERRY 16 THAT CAUGHT ABLAZE WHICH RESULTED IN THE LOSS OF LIVES AND PROPERTIES AND THE ACTUAL DELAY IN THE RESCUE OF PASSENGERS WHO WERE ADRIFT AT OPEN SEA
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SIAO, FREDERICK W.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-02
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2019-11-27
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-09-04;
